job.title: Data Scientist Software Engineer - Ag Robotics Start-up
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtWe build robots for the next frontier of farmingampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are a venturebacked startup based in Davis CA and we build robots to address some of farmings toughest tasksampnbsp Heres what we can offer to you that you cant get anywhere elseampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt The chance to transform an industry and improve the lives of millions of farmworkersampnbspltpgtltpgt Firsthand exposure to an endless supply of incredibly challenging technical problemsampnbspltpgtltpgt The pressure to invent cuttingedge solutions to said problems and mess up along the wayampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgt Limitless career upside you grow as we growampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgt The chance to live in the burbs of sunny California and ride your bike to a farm for work everydayampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgt A workplace that encourages building learning and deployingampnbsp See ltemgtyour workltemgt in the fieldampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtStill interestedampnbsp Read our mission and the job description below to see if youre a good fit for usampnbsp wwwadvancedfarmltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtUse your powers for goodampnbspltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBuild the architecture for logging events and other information to support cutting edge data analysisltligtltligtAnalyze collected data to spot trends in performance and reliability to inform further development by engineering RampampD and field operations teamsampnbspltligtltligtWrite reproducible data analysis that can be automated and scaled as our equipment fleet growsltligtltligtSummarize and clearly communicate data analysis assumptions and resultsampnbspampnbspltligtltligtBuild dashboards and applications that engineers business managers and customers can rely onampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtHeres what well look for when we select someone to join the teamampnbspampnbspltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtMS or higher in mathematics statistics data science engineering or a related field no degree at all is also just fine if you have a strong portfolio of examplesampnbspltligtltligt3 years experience working with data from hardware applications and at least a basic knowledge of electrical and mechanical engineering conceptsampnbspltligtltligtStrong skills in git Python SQL matplotlib numpy pandas other data sciencevisualization toolsampnbspltligtltligtExperience with web apps devops and machine learningampnbspltligtltligtltstronggtltemgtLegal work status in the US please do not apply if you need visa
